decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).

Condition : 3 - Before the any of the dwellings hereby permitted is first occupied, a scheme detailing the proposed design, height, materials and appearance of the site entrance gates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority; and then be implemented in accordance with the approved details. Any pedestrian or vehicular entrance gates to the site shall be fixed open and remain unlocked at all times.
description: Retention of vehicular and pedestrian entrance gates to entrance of site
